name: Karate Master Lee - Run for the Kung Fu Belt
name_original: Karate Master Lee - Run for the Kung Fu Belt
description:
A brand new Karate game which you will love! And it is 100% FREE!

Karate Master Lee - Run for the Kung Fu Belt is a fun and entertaining game which will make your day so much better!

Get extra point by collecting coins. Jump from one platform to another with just an easy touch! Double tap for double jump.

Karate Master Lee - Run for the Kung Fu Belt is a running game where you need to get as far as possible.

Be careful - as further you get - as faster the karate master Lee will run!

Get as many points possible and be on the top of the leaderboard!

Challenge your friends to play and have double fun!

Karate Master Lee - Run for the Kung Fu Belt is waiting just for you!

Become the master of this game. If you love karate, fighting, ninjas and kung fu, you will love this game!

Leave a rating if you like this game!
